## ResourceHandler.canLoad() method

Determine if the resource-handler can handle a given resource. It is suggested that implementers check `resource.profile` to determine this.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canLoad(resource: ResourceSchema, files: Map<string, Blob>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resource | ResourceSchema | the resource being loaded |
|  files | Map&lt;string, Blob&gt; | the files in the packages |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

true if the resource-handler can handle the resource
